frontmatter.title: Configuring Permissions
frontmatter.description: The AWS Distro for OpenTelemetry Collector requires permissions for Amazon CloudWatch Logs for metric publishing, and for AWS X-Ray for sending traces. Learn how to set up permissions by creating an IAM policy.
